triples.name: Generative artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: The paper explores how generative AI models can be applied to improve social science research methods.

triples.name: Survey methodology
triples.relevance: The paper proposes improvements to survey research through the application of generative AI.

triples.name: Web-based experiments
triples.relevance: The paper suggests generative AI can improve online experiments for studying human behavior.

triples.name: Content analysis
triples.relevance: The paper proposes automated content analysis as a technique that can be enhanced by generative AI.

triples.name: Agent-based model
triples.relevance: The paper proposes that generative AI can improve agent-based modeling techniques used in social science.

triples.name: Social research
triples.relevance: The paper proposes new approaches and infrastructure for social science research using generative AI.

triples.name: Human behavior
triples.relevance: Understanding human behavior is the core subject of social science research that the paper aims to improve.
